text: Kare-ra wa itta. `Shuaibu yo, anata no inoru tokoro no mono wa, watashi-tachi no sosen ga sūhai shita mono o suteru yō ni anata ni meijita no ka. Mata jibun no zaisan ni kanshi, nozomi-dōri ni shori shite wa naranai no ka. Hontōni anata wa, shinsetsu ni tadashī michi ni michibiku monona no ka
